[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1503345026539{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space]

[vc_cta text="HIV Clinic" h2_google_fonts="font_family:Arimo%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic|font_style:700%20bold%20regular%3A700%3Anormal" h4_google_fonts="font_family:Lato%3A100%2C100italic%2C300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal" align="center" heading_sep="yes" tag="h2" h2="HIV Clinic" txt_align="center" i_css_animation="" css_animation=""][/vc_cta]
[vc_column_text]The HIV clinic has grown by leaps & bounds since it was started in 2012 and is currently supporting a number of patients along Entebbe road and beyond. We run a full-time clinic from 8:00 am to 8:00 pm with support by the Ministry of Health.

Services offered include HIV testing and counselling, CD4 count, viral load, HAART, PEP and EMTCT services, TB screening and treatment plus follow up is also done. All pregnant mothers are tested and EMTCT services and support are offered to both the mother and the baby.

Also as part of community support, outreach services are done and on-site facility camps to increase community awareness and giving back.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
